thread.section_title: The Lexington New York City, Autograph Collection - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Stylish and convenient comfort
thread.title_full: Stylish and convenient comfort - Review of The Lexington New York City, Autograph Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Chris C
title: Stylish and convenient comfort
text: Chosen for its proximity to GCT, I was very happy to discover The Lexington. I arrived very late, was greeted by a very friendly staff and given complimentary water for my room. The room was efficient, stylish, and quiet even though I was not on a high floor. I did not stay very long but I would definitely return.
